summary.span: 命名空间包含将 Microsoft .NET Framework 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 集成到 Microsoft SQL Server 和 SQL Server 数据库引擎进程执行环境时所要用到的类、接口和枚举。

span.span: The namespace contains classes, interfaces, and enumerations that are specific to the integration of the Microsoft .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) into Microsoft SQL Server, and the SQL Server database engine process execution environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用命名空间中的属性类，可以在任何支持的 .NET Framework 中创建存储过程、触发器、用户定义类型、用户定义函数（标量函数和表值）以及用户定义的聚合函数。语言.Using the attribute classes in the namespace, you can create stored procedures, triggers, user-defined types, user-defined functions (both scalar and table-valued), and user-defined aggregate functions in any supported .NET Framework language. 你还可以在 SQL Server 中注册它们。You can also register them in SQL Server. 查询类，以确定当前正在执行的代码是否正在 SQL Server 数据库引擎进程中运行。Query the class to determine whether the currently executing code is running in the SQL Server database engine process. 当用户调用服务器上的托管存储过程或函数时，或者当用户的操作激发托管代码触发器时，这也会提供调用方的上下文。This also provides the caller's context when a user calls a managed stored procedure or function on the server, or when a user's action fires a managed code trigger. 类提供一个对象，通过该对象，可以从存储过程将结果返回到客户端， 该对象提供有关导致触发触发器的操作的信息，以及 对象，该对象可用于确定客户端使用集成安全性进行身份验证时调用客户端的标识。The class provides a object, through which results are returned to the client from a stored procedure, a object, which provides information about the operation that caused a trigger to be fired, and a object, which can be used to determine the identity of the calling client when the client used integrated security for authentication. 有关 SQL Server CLR 集成和命名空间中的 api 的详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 文档](/sql/sql-server/)。For more information about SQL Server CLR integration and the APIs in the namespace, see [SQL Server Documentation](/sql/sql-server/).
